EmailTemplate.subject: How you will be paid for your role with The Challenge Network
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
lease do not respond to this email. This email was sent from an unattended mailbox, and replies are not reviewed. Please instead contact your Staffing representative on {!Job_placement__c.Staffing_Associate_email__c}
Dear {!Job_placement__c.Contact_Name__c},
Congratulations on being appointed as {!Job_placement__c.Role__c} with The Challenge Network this summer on {!Job_placement__c.Wave__c}.
Your total pay for this part of your role will be XXX , which is subject to tax and national insurance deductions. It will be paid on {!Job__c.RCA_grad_payroll_date__c}. Tax and NI deductions will happen from this payment.
This payment structure has two principles: (a) to ensure that staff members pay the appropriate level of tax in the correct month and (b) to enable staff members to receive payment.
Yours sincerely,
{!Job_placement__c.Staffing_Associate__c} The Challenge Network e: {!Job_placement__c.Staffing_Associate_email__c} CR 2.4.1
